pageContext.claim: “The highest business tax rate in the developed world would be created, sending millions and millions of jobs out of America, into China and various other countries.”
pageContext.analysis: Joe Biden proposed an increase in the statutory top corporate tax rate, to a new high of 28 percent. That would be higher than average but it would not be the highest in the developed world. Australia has a rate of 30 percent, Germany is at 29.90 percent and Japan has a rate of 29.74 percent, according to the Tax Foundation.
